pages.text: You probably noticed, but natural health regeneration has been turned off. There are several options to recover your health, but having full food will not heal you.
$(br2)$(br2)The following pages will illustrate some of the options to keep yourself in top fighting shape.

pages.title: Regen Campfires
pages.text: $(br2)Having a campfire nearby will give you regen. However, the campfire will not burn forever. You will need to give it logs to keep the regen running.

pages.title: Bandages and Salves
pages.text: $(br2)The mod Rough Tweaks adds a variety of healing items, from bandages to plasters and even a medkit.

pages.title: Sleeping
pages.text: $(br2)Sleeping does recover a small amount of health as well. Not to mention it keeps the phantoms away.

pages.title: Potions
pages.text: $(br2)Potions are probably a bit more useful now, since there are options to have them in larger stacks, and they can be used to heal.
